Class ClientHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • ClientHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    public class ClientHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Class handles connection and communication between clients. Allows to handle requests and communicate with specified client - send and receive messages.

      • ClientHandler

        public ClientHandler​(java.net.Socket clientSocket,
                     java.util.ArrayList<Chatroom> users,
                     Chatroom chatroom,
                     ServerFrame f)
              throws java.io.IOException
        Creates new thread responsible for communication with specified client
        Parameters:
        clientSocket - client Socket you want communicate with
        users - list of users in chatroom.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - When can't establish stream connection with client.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Main method responsible for receiving and sending messages. Sends received message to all users in chatroom. Also responsible for handling user requests.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage​(Message msg)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Safely sends message to this client.
        Parameters:
        msg - Message you want to send.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - When stream error occurs.

      • sendMessageToAll

        public void sendMessageToAll​(Message msg)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Safely sends message to all clients in chatroom.
        Parameters:
        msg - Message you want to send.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - When stream error occurs.
